actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: To amend the Petroleum Marketing Practices Act to provide consumers with additional information concerning the octane rating of gasoline.

summary.text: Amends the Petroleum Marketing Practices Act to require gasoline retailers to display in a clear and conspicuous manner on each gasoline dispenser, at the point of sale to the ultimate purchaser of automotive gasoline, a specified warning statement concerning octane ratings. Requires the Environmental Protection Agency to enforce this Act.

titles.title: To amend the Petroleum Marketing Practices Act to provide consumers with additional information concerning the octane rating of gasoline.
